tagline: Dead simple UI syncing using SignalR
body:
### Woah. SignalRamp preys on statis. Say what? Yay. **SignalR**amp provides the on-ramp for simple, multi-directional syncing of your UI. It uses [SignalR](https://github.com/SignalR/SignalR) library along with [SignalGrr](https://github.com/TimHeckel/SignalGrr) as a proxy server to wire client UIs together for immediate real-time updating. It's really easy. ### Live Demo [Click here](example.html) to see it in action. (Be sure to open this page in two separate browsers). ### Usage Given this HTML: ```
One Two
CLICK ME
...
``` This is all that's required to turn on real-time syncing: ``` $("#parent").signalRamp({proxyName: 'someUniqueName'}); ``` The `proxyName` **must** be the same for all the clients that wish to collaborate.
